Package thing.dna.variator

Class C_RecombinatorMapGenome

  • java.lang.Object
    • thing.dna.variator.C_RecombinatorMapGenome
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    I_Recombinator
    public class C_RecombinatorMapGenome
extends java.lang.Object
implements I_Recombinator
    Single-point crossover using map units (on MapGenomes). Crossover point is chosen based on map length (a "virtual" length) of the chromosome pair, not based on how many loci it has.
    Author:
    kyle wagner, elyk@cs.indiana.edu Version 1.0, april 25, 2002, modif. J.LeFur 09/2011

      C_ChromosomePair crossover​(C_Chromosome xsome1, C_Chromosome xsome2)
      Perform 1-pt crossover on these two chromosomes and return the resulting new chromosome.

    • Method Detail

      • crossover

        public C_ChromosomePair crossover​(C_Chromosome xsome1,
                                  C_Chromosome xsome2)
        Perform 1-pt crossover on these two chromosomes and return the resulting new chromosome. This is efficient if Chromatids's getGene() is constant or even log(n) access time.
        Specified by:
        crossover in interface I_Recombinator
        Parameters:
        xsome1 - xsome2 chromosomes to be recombined - parents of a new chromosome
        Returns:
        a NEW chromosome pair which is the recombination of genes from xsome1 and xsome2 Author kyle Wagner / rev. J.Le Fur 2011
